Subject: Pirate Sea Chanties!
Description: Rathbone the Pirate will enchant us with authentic sea chanties throughout the weekend!  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate - Track: Mayhem  - Duration: 00 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Pirate Treasure Hunt!
Description: Join our Mayhem Featured Guest Rathbone the Pirate on a treasure hunt throughout the hotel!  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate - Track: Mayhem  - Duration: 00 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: 'Pieces of Eight' Live from Penguicon!
Description: This live recording of Rathbone the Pirate's 'Pieces of Eight' webcast will give attendees a chance to have their pirate questions answered. Special guest: Mitch 'Duckman' Peters  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate, Mitch 'Duckman' Peters - Track: Mayhem, Media  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: A Panel on Paneling
Description: In this mayhem fueled panel, Daniel Dugan will demonstrate everything that could possibly go wrong during a panel. Expect a few laughs, awkward pauses, loaded questions and general mischief.  Speakers include:Daniel Dugan, Rathbone the Pirate - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Pirate Rum History Tastings
Description:
Rum is probably one of the first things people think of when they think of pirates. We could give a fancy description of the lecture about the history of rum, but you're really just coming to drink rum-- so let's taste some different rums! 21+ and ID will be required. Sign up at Ops.
  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Eat Like a Pirate
Description: Cuisine is probably not the first thing people think of when they think of pirates, but the Navy food was so bad that many Navy sailors turned pirate just to escape it. Come learn about common foods eaten aboard ships during the Golden Age of piracy and take home a recipe or two to try.  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Rathbone Vs Everybody
Description: Avast! Rathbone the Pirate will simultaneously compete against all of you swabs, playing several different games from the age of piracy! (Attention: When a pirate cheats, it is only illegal if the pirate gets caught at it. This has been an advisory of the Caribbean Warning System.)  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
Location: Game Table A, Game Table B

Subject: Authentic Pirate Games
Description: Learn several card games and board games from the late 17th and early 18th centuries.  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
